ro_node.tpch_query: select n_name, l_extendedprice, l_discount from region, nation, customer, orders, lineitem, supplier where c_custkey = o_custkey and l_orderkey = o_orderkey and l_suppkey = s_suppkey and c_nationkey = n_nationkey and s_nationkey = n_nationkey and n_regionkey = r_regionkey and r_name = 'ASIA' and c_nationkey >= 6 and c_nationkey < 11 and s_nationkey >= 6 and s_nationkey < 11 and o_orderdate >= '1995-01-01' and o_orderdate < '1996-01-01' and l_shipdate >= '1992-01-01' and l_shipdate < '1998-01-01' order by l_extendedprice desc;
